title: IMMUNITY BOOSTER in Crystal, MN | AKN Wellness
description: IMMUNITY BOOSTER - Strengthen your immune system with a complete combination of vitamins, antioxidants, and electrolytes to help fight infections such as cold and flu. The
cleaned_text: Strengthen your immune system with a complete combination of vitamins, antioxidants, and electrolytes to help fight infections such as cold and flu. The Immune Booster uses a powerful combination of immune boosting ingredients to support your immune system and help prevent illness. This therapy may help reduce the severity and duration of your illness. Disclaimer: The information on this website is for general information purposes only. Nothing on this site should be taken as medical advice for any individual case or situation.
